item.description: The Mix CT is a really good 80's rock cover band . Groups like Journey, Rush etc. The Mix will be rockin Stonebridge again! Karen will have a table/ booth in front of the band with a sign that says Party Express and a balloon. Karen will be there by 9pm look for the sign or the red hair! Karen called Stonebridge --- no cover charge! They will offer us $1 off drinks if we tell them we are with the meetup group from 9-12midnight.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Let's rock the house with the Mix CT at Stonebridge!
